__imagegallery_module_info__: A simple image gallery, where you can add as many images as you want, that will be displayed in a big gallery, which the user can browse through.
__imagegallery_pageblocks_imagegallery_d: A simple image gallery, where you can add as many images as you want, that will be displayed in a big gallery, which the user can browse through.
__imagegallery_pageblocks_imagegallery_m: If multiple images with that width can fit into a row, they will displayed in a row.
